Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI

Interface ObserverGUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIController
public interface ObserverGUI
Interface that defines all the methods that could be called whenever the GUI receives an input. A class that implements this interface is a class that can observe inputs given on the GUI and act accordingly.
